overview: Amelia Earhart was a heroine. The first woman to fly solo across the Atlantic in 1928, she disappeared without a trace during her attempt to circumnavigate the globe. Erja is in mid-life. She confronts her youthful enthusiasm for the flight pioneer, and her disillusionment with her own biography. This experimental animation combines re-enactments with archival material.
title: In Love with Amelia Earhart
